content:
I think I'll go with a natural stone fountain in a quiet corner of my backyard. It will add a sense of serenity and create a focal point in the seating area. I'll choose a design that blends with my Rustic Modern aesthetic and adds a touch of elegance to my outdoor space. Thanks for the ideas!

Now, I'd like to discuss the interior design of my bungalow. I'm thinking of painting the walls a light neutral color to make the space feel brighter and more airy. What are your thoughts on this, and do you have any suggestions for a specific color palette?
